DOC.brief_summary: Insufficient cognitive control emotional distracters characteristic major depressive disorder ( MDD ) . Hypoactivation dorsolateral prefrontal cortex ( dlPFC ) associate deficit . In study investigator assess effect decrease dlPFC activity healthy subject cathodal transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) cognitive control . In double-blinded , balanced randomize , sham-controlled crossover trial investigator determine effect single-session cathodal tDCS leave dlPFC cognitive control healthy subject . To assess cognitive control investigator use delay response work memory task ( DWM ) arithmetic inhibition task ( AIT ) picture vary valence .
DOC.brief_title: Interference With Cognitive Control Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation
